sentences.sentence: Apr 8: Wuhan lifted outbound traffic restrictions.
sentences.translation: 4月8日，武汉市解除离市交通管制。

sentences.sentence: He was born in Hong Kong on Apr. 7th, 1954.
sentences.translation: 他于1954年4月7日出生于香港。

sentences.sentence: Apr 26: The last Covid-19 patient in Wuhan was discharged from hospital.
sentences.translation: 4月26日，武汉最后一名新冠肺炎患者出院了。
